name: hban
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wal(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wal(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wal(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wal(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wal(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph /\ ps ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 2-Jan-2018.)
